alert.note: Alert for Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:56AM PST until February 23 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions. Tree branches could fall as well. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch, with localized amounts up to 3 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills. * WHEN...4 PM today to noon Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
